alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Corson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 25 at 5:31PM MDT until October 27 at 5:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM CDT /6 AM MDT/ THURSDAY TO 6 AM CDT /5 AM MDT/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Corson and Campbell Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM CDT /6 AM MDT/ Thursday to 6 AM CDT /5 AM MDT/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
